messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Father's Stopover Theta, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Father's Stopover Theta door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Father's Stopover Theta door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Father's Stopover Theta's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The Central Command Audit is over, the station has passed on probationary charter measures. The Centcom Official will now depart.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Xenobiology Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Father's Stopover Theta door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failure imminent. Please contact you*%fj00)`5vc-BZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Figments from an eldritch god are being summoned by Banana Man into Head of Security's Office from an unknown dimension. Disrupt the ritual at all costs!
